title: The Startup Playbook for Hiring Your First Engineers and AEs

speaker.name: David Paffenholse
speaker.title: Co-founder & CEO of Juicebox
speaker.background: Juicebox is an AI sourcing platform backed by Sequoia, used by Ramp, Cursor, and Perplexity

description: Learn how to source and hire your first engineers and account executives. David shares strategies for finding top talent, crafting compelling outreach, and closing candidates in a competitive market.
